idea-plugin.name: ApiTool
idea-plugin.description:
A request service development aid plugin.

  1. gitee| github
  2. Only Java language is supported.
  3. Support for Spring annotation system (Spring MVC / Spring Boot)
  4. Provides a regional display API interface
  5. Double-click a method node to jump directly to the corresponding method definition
  6. Configurable multiple environments
  7. The default environment is to read the ports in order of bootstrap.(properties, yaml, yml) and application.(properties, yaml, yml) priority.

一个请求服务开发辅助工具插件

  1. gitee| github
  2. 只支持 java 语言
  3. 支持 Spring 注解体系(Spring MVC / Spring Boot)
  4. 提供了一块区域展示 API 接口
  5. 双击方法结点直接跳转到对应的方法定义
  6. 可配置多环境
  7. 默认环境是按 bootstrap.(properties、yaml、yml)、application.(properties、yaml、yml) 优先级顺序读取其中的 port
